page.title: 12AN ORDINARY DAY
page.content: I wake up at about 8 o'clock, I get dressed and I have my breakfast and then I get ready for school. At around 8.40 I start to walk to school with my sister. I meet my friend and we talk until it is time to line up to go into school. In school we work in groups and my group usually does Maths or Language work first. We also use the computer to help us with some of our work and I always enjoy that. In the middle of the morning we have a break and I usually have crisps to eat, I share them with my friend. After lunch we do various activities - P.E.,music, art, project work and sometimes our teacher reads to us. At 3.15 we go home and I play football with my friends until tea-time. I play with my computer until bed-time and then read until I fall asleep.
